description: Utmach is an initiative that focuses on enhancing soil management and plant nutrition in agriculture, particularly for crops like banana and cocoa. Working closely with the Technical University of Machala, particularly through its Faculty of Agricultural Sciences, Utmach aims to bridge the gap between academia and local agricultural practices, promoting sustainable farming techniques. The faculty collaborates with various organizations to conduct research, provide training, and address environmental challenges, ultimately contributing to food security and agricultural sustainability in the region.
name: Utmach
